metadata.title: CVE-2016-5837 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress before 4.5.3 allows remote attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions and remove a category attribute from a post via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
